page.title: 07THE VILLAGE OF FAILAND
page.content: {FAILAND }is the main village of the area.It is situated 5 miles to the South West of Bristol.There are bungalows mostly and there is one service station.The main roads are straight and very busy and meet at traffic lights.This area is a peaceful,quiet country district.There is no commercialization in this area except two quarries.There are open fields and the main industry is pastoral farming.The bungalows are very expensive and big.Failand is a nice area and the houses are modern.
